metadata.title: Telegram Customer POV - Network Complaint via Bot
metadata.description: A customer reaches out via Telegram to report slow internet, demonstrating the end-user experience of the AI-powered support bot.

steps.narration: Let's see the experience from the customer's perspective. The customer opens Telegram Web to contact their telecom provider's support bot.
The customer searches for the support bot in their chat list.
The customer selects the BM AI support bot from the search results.
Now the customer types their complaint. They are experiencing slow internet and have already tried basic troubleshooting.

steps.value: Hi, my internet has been extremely slow since yesterday. I've restarted my router multiple times but nothing works. My customer ID is C005092. Please fix this urgently!

steps.narration: The customer sends the message and waits for a response from the AI-powered bot.

The bot processes the message through the BM AI Platform's Telegram-to-CRM workflow. Behind the scenes, the platform classifies the intent as a network issue, creates a TMF621 trouble ticket, and generates an appropriate response. The customer receives a confirmation that their issue has been logged and is being addressed.

From the customer's perspective, this was a simple chat interaction. But behind the scenes, the AI platform orchestrated intent classification, ticket creation, and response generation â€” all in seconds. This is the power of the BM AI Platform's workflow automation.
